author: ZachBerget
post_text: December 20, 2018 at 1:44 AM#1Hi All!Having trouble when creating a command to change the form of an effect.Ex.Assign Effect 1.x.y /form=zIs this on the right path?Thanks!

posts.author: ZachBerget
posts.post_text: December 20, 2018 at 1:44 AM#1Hi All!Having trouble when creating a command to change the form of an effect.Ex.Assign Effect 1.x.y /form=zIs this on the right path?Thanks!

posts.author: Duplicate dherderich
posts.post_text: December 20, 2018 at 1:32 PM#2Try this:Assign Form x At Effect yAssign Form x At Effect 1.y.z

posts.author: ZachBerget
posts.post_text: December 21, 2018 at 4:16 AM#3Thank you for your response! That was the ticket. Not sure how I didn't try that in the first couple tries.Thanks!

title: Changing form of an effect with macro
